input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
East Carolina Pirates Men's Executive Watch

Item specifications:
Links Make Watch Adjustable
Stainless Steel
Men
23kt Gold-Plated Bezel
Officially Licensed East Carolina Pirates Men's Two Tone Gold Dress Watch
input_text.Response A: This elegant men's two tone gold dress watch from the East Carolina Pirates collection is perfect for any occasion. Made from stainless steel, this watch features a 23kt gold-plated bezel and a black leather strap. The watch's crystal is scratch resistant and the movement is quartz. This watch is officially licensed by the East Carolina Pirates and comes with a two-year warranty. Links make the watch adjustable to fit most wrist sizes.
input_text.Response B: This stainless steel watch with 23kt gold-plated bezel and adjustable link bracelet is a great way for any man to show his team spirit. It features a protective mineral crystal dial window, a date display, and a quartz movement. The watch is water resistant to 30 meters. It makes a great gift for any occasion!

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A invents info not provided in the prompt, and the added info does not make sense.
